    • Attack

      public int Attack(Button start, Button end)
      Transformer Makes an attack Precondition start and end are type buttons Post-condition fight done (made some checks for validity if not valid returns )
      Parameters:
      start - button that attacks
      end - button that is attacked
      Returns:
      (difrence 0 if attack not valid if attack valid return 1 if flag captured return 2)attacker wins 0,defender wins return 1,trap attacked 2,flag attacked 3

    • Rescue

      public void Rescue(Button button)
      Transformer Brings back a piece from the dead it is deployed in the start if it is allowed to be rescued + we replace the pieces Precondition type MyButton and not null. Post-condition Piece nor dead add the rescued one and delete the current and add it to the dead
      Parameters:
      button - the button that will be swapped
